abstract: BP’s partners in Russia, who have filed an injunction seeking to stop a BP deal with Rosneft, are now trying to withhold dividend payments from their Russian joint venture, TNK-BP.
snippet: BP’s partners in Russia, who have filed an injunction seeking to stop a BP deal with Rosneft, are now trying to withhold dividend payments from their Russian joint venture, TNK-BP.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW — BP suggested over the weekend that the latest dispute with its powerful Russian partners, who are looking to derail BP’s deal with the state-run oil company Rosneft, might be swiftly resolved in an arbitration process, rather than in court.

headline.main: Russian Partners Move to Block TNK-BP Payout
